latex:
In the addition shown below $A$, $B$, $C$, and $D$ are distinct digits. How many different values are possible for $D$?\\
\\
\[\begin{array}{lr}
&ABBCB \\
+& BCADA \\
\hline

& DBDDD
\end{array}\]\\
\\
$\textbf{(A) }2\qquad\textbf{(B) }4\qquad\textbf{(C) }7\qquad\textbf{(D) }8\qquad\textbf{(E) }9$
